snippet: RATNER--Michael. North Star Fund deeply mourns the loss of Michael Ratner, a lion of the global social justice movement. A founding donor and longtime advisory board member, Michael was ever there for us. Our heartfelt condolences go out to Karen, Ana, Jake and everyone at the Center for Constitutional Rights and those in New York City's broader progressive community who knew, loved and respected our dearest and most fierce donor leader. 1/3
lead_paragraph: RATNER--Michael. North Star Fund deeply mourns the loss of Michael Ratner, a lion of the global social justice movement. A founding donor and longtime advisory board member, Michael was ever there for us. Our heartfelt condolences go out to Karen, Ana, Jake and everyone at the Center for Constitutional Rights and those in New York City's broader progressive community who knew, loved and respected our dearest and most fierce donor leader. 1/3
